1. is_/\-irreducible_in [armstrng]

Source [armstrng]

definition
let x, X be set ;
pred x is_/\-irreducible_in X means :: ARMSTRNG:def 2
( x in X & ( for z, y being set st z in X & y in X & x = z /\ y & not x = z holds
x = y ) );
end;
